com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.makelangeloRobot.settings.hardwareProperties

Interface MakelangeloHardwareProperties

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Makelangelo2Properties, Makelangelo3Properties, Makelangelo5Properties

    public interface MakelangeloHardwareProperties
    Properties of each Makelangelo version. These are non-configurable features unique to each machine.
    Author:
    Dan Royer

    • Method Summary
